quote: Serious voter fraud in Virginia, New Hampshire and California - so why isn't the media reporting on this? Serious bias - big problem!
quotePlain: Serious voter fraud in Virginia, New Hampshire and California - so why isn’t the media reporting on this? Serious bias - big problem!
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: The top state election official in Virginia says the charge is "unfounded." The former chairman of Trump’s Virginia campaign says he’s unaware of any "massive voter fraud on Election Day."
checks.quotePlain: The top state election official in Virginia says the charge is “unfounded.” The former chairman of Trump’s Virginia campaign says he’s unaware of any “massive voter fraud on Election Day.”

checks.quote: Those in charge of overseeing New Hampshire’s elections and investigating election complaints said any instances of voter fraud in the state have historically been extremely rare. The most recent election was no exception, with no complaints of voter fraud filed in an election in which more than 728,000 ballots were cast.
checks.quotePlain: Those in charge of overseeing New Hampshire’s elections and investigating election complaints said any instances of voter fraud in the state have historically been extremely rare. The most recent election was no exception, with no complaints of voter fraud filed in an election in which more than 728,000 ballots were cast.

checks.quote: Elections officials and nonpartisan observers in California said there were no widespread reports of voter fraud. The state has some of the most stringent voter verification laws in the country. Allegations of fraud are so rare that Los Angeles County, the state’s largest county, does not track them.
checks.quotePlain: Elections officials and nonpartisan observers in California said there were no widespread reports of voter fraud. The state has some of the most stringent voter verification laws in the country. Allegations of fraud are so rare that Los Angeles County, the state’s largest county, does not track them.

claims.title: serious voter fraud in CA during 2016 election
claims.negative: there was no serious voter fraud in CA during 2016 election
claims.negativePlain: there was no serious voter fraud in CA during 2016 election
claims.truth: There is no evidence of this.
claims.truthPlain: There is no evidence of this.
